1096825181081808896.text:
The more I go to $crypto/blockchain conferences, the more I am convinced we are in a giant echo chamber.

Almost everyone is creating content for themselves or for people that are already in the know.

Not many are reaching out to a new audience.

To do this, education is needed.

1096076409427148800.text:
The future of education.

Some predictions:

1. Home schooling will be extremely common
2. The stigma around tutoring will disappear 
3. The best independent online teachers will make more than of $1 million per year. 

A billion dollar business will be built in each space.

Two kinds of happiness.

Worldly happiness is reward from our evolutionary program. Get praise, money, drugs, sex. It busies the mind with craving & anxiety.

Internal happiness is reward from being in flow. Create, meditate, love, play. It clears the mind & leaves us in peace.

Wallets should "verify" addresses by sending the recipient a tiny random fraction of a token and have wait for confirmation that the intended recipient received them. Then add the address to a whitelist.

Same as PayPal etc. do when linking a bank account.

Personally, few things bother me more than bystanders seeking only to criticize those who are working hard. It's much easier to destroy than to create. If you critique something, always offer a solution.
